text:
Теперь я понимаю причину ошибки. Ошибка "The socket connection was closed unexpectedly" возникает из-за проблем с сетевыми соединениями. В коде есть функция `categorizeError`, которая определяет тип ошибки:


## Investigating error cause  
- The error "The socket connection was closed unexpectedly" stems from network connection issues.  
- The `categorizeError` function in the code identifies the type of error encountered.

## Examining error specifics  
- The "socket connection was closed unexpectedly" error is distinct, potentially caused by connection timeouts from server inactivity.  
- Other causes include network packet loss, unstable connections, or server limits during high API load.  
- SSL/TLS issues, especially in HTTPS connections, can also trigger this error.  
- Keep-alive problems may lead to connections closing prematurely, adding to the issue.
